content: granny christmas stockings these are quick and easy mini stockings based on the traditional granny square with a loop that you can use to hang them on a tree or garland great treats to add to the table with a small chocolate inside - you might be able to guess what my favourite is from the photo below you will need three different colours of dk yarn and a 5 5mm crochet hook i like to use traditional red green and white or cream you can go for bold or muted versions or try something with a little sparkle blues and white give a lovely winter ice effect too there are stitch guides instructions and a chart on the second page uk terms instructions chain 4 and join with slip_stitch to make a ring or make a magic_ring if you prefer round 1 ch3 counts as one treble 2tr into ring ch1 3tr into ring ch1 three times join with slip stitch to top of first ch3 end first colour round 2 ch3 counts as one treble 2tr into ch1 space from previous row 3tr into next ch1 space ch1 3tr into same space three times 3tr into first ch1 space ch1 and join with slip_stitch to top of first ch3 end second colour round 3 ch3 counts as one treble 2tr into ch1 space from previous row 3tr into space between sets of three trebles 3tr ch1 3tr into corner space 3tr into next space into next corner space make 3tr ch1 3 dtr dtr into each of next three treble_crochet from previous row 10dtr into next space dtr into next three treble_crochet into corner space make 3dtr ch1 3tr 3tr into next space 3tr into first ch1 space ch1 and join with slip_stitch to top of first chain join fold the stocking in half - the long stitches will form the toe part of the boot starting at the bottom corner using the middle colour or maybe a metallic one join the edge of the boot using a double_crochet stitch through both sides to close up the seam finishing at the top ch10 and join to the last double_crochet you made fasten_off sew in the yarn at the top for the tail of yarn at the toe of the stocking you can just pull this through to the inside with your hook i won t tell anyone if you leave it there these stockings are based on the traditional granny square pattern with variations on one edge to make the longer stitches which curve the work out to make the toe of the stocking symbols chain treble treble_crochet abbreviations chain - chain us chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch us slip_stitch double_crochet - double_crochet us single_crochet - single_crochet treble_crochet - treble us double_crochet - double_crochet dtr - treble_crochet us treble_crochet - treble how to make the stitches double_crochet - insert hook into top of stitch from previous row yarn over and pull through yarn over pull yarn through two loops
